column1: PT sentence: Esta emoção é difícil de explicar.
RU sentence: Эту эмоцию сложно объяснить.
EN sentence: This emotion is hard to explain.
PT sentence: O meu estado mudou hoje.
RU sentence: Моё состояние сегодня изменилось.
EN sentence: My state has changed today.
PT sentence: Estou de bom humor hoje.
RU sentence: Сегодня у меня хорошее настроение.
EN sentence: I am in a good mood today.
PT sentence: É um sentimento estranho.
EN sentence: It's a strange feeling.
PT sentence: Senti muita alegria ao ver isso.
RU sentence: Я почувствовал(а) большую радость
EN sentence: I felt great joy when I saw it.
PT sentence: A felicidade está nas pequenas coisas.
EN sentence: Happiness is in the small things.
PT sentence: Foi um prazer ajudar.
EN sentence: It was a pleasure to help.
PT sentence: Preciso de mais tranquilidade.
RU sentence: Мне нужно больше спокойствия.
EN sentence: I need more calm.
PT sentence: Tenho confiança na decisão.
RU sentence: Я уверен(а) в этом решении.
EN sentence: I am confident in the decision.
PT sentence: Senti um grande alívio.
RU sentence: Я почувствовал(а) большое облегчение.
EN sentence: I felt great relief.
PT sentence: Tenho interesse no assunto.
RU sentence: Мне интересна эта тема.
EN sentence: I am interested in the topic.
RU sentence: Сегодня мне не хватает вдохновения.
EN sentence: I lack inspiration today.
PT sentence: Senti muita satisfação com o resultado.
RU sentence: Я испытал(а) удовлетворение от результата.
EN sentence: I felt a lot of satisfaction with the result.
PT sentence: Sinto muita gratidão por isso.
RU sentence: Я испытываю большую благодарность за это.
EN sentence: I feel a lot of gratitude for this.
PT sentence: A curiosidade levou-me a perguntar.
RU sentence: Любопытство заставило меня спросить.
EN sentence: Curiosity made me ask.
PT sentence: Sinto uma certa tristeza hoje.
RU sentence: Сегодня я чувствую грусть.
EN sentence: I feel some sadness today.
PT sentence: A melancolia apareceu de repente.
PT sentence: Sinto saudade de casa.
RU sentence: Я тоскую по дому.
EN sentence: Fatigue has built up.
PT sentence: Estou em completa exaustão.
RU sentence: Я в полном изнеможении.
EN sentence: I am completely exhausted.
PT sentence: A apatia tomou conta de mim.
EN sentence: Apathy took over me.
PT sentence: Senti irritação na conversa.
RU sentence: Я почувствовал(а) раздражение в разговоре.
EN sentence: I felt irritation during the conversation.
PT sentence: A raiva apareceu rapidamente.
PT sentence: Ele falou com fúria.
RU sentence: Он говорил с гневом.
EN sentence: He spoke with fury.
PT sentence: Senti medo naquele momento.
RU sentence: В тот момент я почувствовал(а) страх.
EN sentence: I felt fear at that moment.
PT sentence: A ansiedade não passa.
EN sentence: Anxiety doesn't go away.
PT sentence: Há muita preocupação no ar.
RU sentence: В воздухе много беспокойства.
EN sentence: There is a lot of worry in the air.
PT sentence: Sinto tensão no corpo.
RU sentence: Я чувствую напряжение в теле.
EN sentence: I feel tension in my body.
PT sentence: O trabalho causa stress.
PT sentence: Estou em completa confusão.
RU sentence: Я в полной растерянности.
EN sentence: I am completely confused.
RU sentence: У меня есть сомнение.
EN sentence: I have a doubt.
RU sentence: Сейчас я чувствую неуверенность.
EN sentence: I feel insecure now.
PT sentence: Senti culpa depois disso.
RU sentence: После этого я почувствовал(а) вину.
EN sentence: I felt guilt after that.
PT sentence: Foi uma situação de embaraço.
RU sentence: Это была неловкая ситуация.
EN sentence: It was an embarrassing situation.
PT sentence: A desilusão foi grande.
EN sentence: The disappointment was big.
PT sentence: Senti abatimento ao final do dia.
RU sentence: К концу дня я чувствовал(а) подавленность.
EN sentence: I felt low by the end of the day.
PT sentence: A solidão pesa às vezes.
EN sentence: Loneliness can be heavy sometimes.
PT sentence: O tédio apareceu rápido.
EN sentence: They reacted with indifference.
PT sentence: Foi uma surpresa agradável.
RU sentence: Это было приятное удивление.
EN sentence: It was a pleasant surprise.
PT sentence: A notícia causou choque.
EN sentence: The news caused shock.
PT sentence: Ficou em completa perplexidade.
EN sentence: They were completely perplexed.
PT sentence: Sinto nervosismo antes do evento.
RU sentence: Перед событием я чувствую волнение.
EN sentence: I feel nervous before the event.
RU sentence: Надежда всё ещё есть.
EN sentence: There is still hope.
PT sentence: O otimismo ajuda muito.
EN sentence: Optimism helps a lot.
EN sentence: Pessimism gets in the way.
PT sentence: A resiliência é importante.
PT sentence: Sinto uma grande sobrecarga.
PT sentence: Sinto um vazio estranho.
EN sentence: I feel an emptiness.
PT sentence: O cansaço emocional acumulou-se.
EN sentence: Emotional fatigue has built up.
